definition: snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: I think I'll have a Dry Sherry instead of the kirsch.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一杯没有甜味的雪利酒，不要樱桃酒。

sentences.english: I patiently filled him in on the British tradition of sherry tippling .
sentences.chinese: 我耐心细致地给他讲述了英国人畅饮雪利酒的传统。

sentences.english: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.chinese: 她极力向我推荐她的劣质雪利酒。

sentences.english: In today's jerez, still have a lot of famous city international sherry brewery.
sentences.chinese: 在如今的赫雷斯市，依然有很多闻名国际的雪利酒厂。

sentences.english: All sherry is made from wine fortified with brandy.
sentences.chinese: 所有的雪利酒都是在葡萄酒中加入白兰地勾兑成的。

sentences.english: Vanilla with a hint of ginger, dried fruits, sherry sweetness and wood □□oke.
sentences.chinese: 香草与暗示生姜，干果，雪利酒甜度和木材烟雾。

sentences.english: Sherry is half as strong again as table wine.
sentences.chinese: 雪利酒比佐餐酒酒劲强一半。

sentences.english: The main course was roast pork with apple sauce, the dessert was trifle.
sentences.chinese: 主菜是烤猪肉加苹果酱，雪利酒蛋糕做为饭后甜食。

sentences.english: Fortified wines, such as port and sherry, contain added Brandy.
sentences.chinese: 强化酒如波特酒和雪利酒，用白兰地来增加酒精含量。

sentences.english: Let's have a drink to christen our new sherry glasses.
sentences.chinese: 让我们为使用我们新的雪利酒杯喝点儿酒。

sentences.english: But even the omelet couldn't compare to the next tapa mushroom in a sherry and butter sauce.
sentences.chinese: 但这种煎蛋还是比不上一种轻食雪利酒奶油酱汁蘑菇。

sentences.english: A couple of sherries thawed out the guests.
sentences.chinese: 喝了几杯雪利酒后，客人们变得不那么拘束了。

sentences.english: Perhaps Santa should consider cutting back on the sherry as well.
sentences.chinese: 这样看来，圣诞老人可能还得考虑一下少喝雪利酒。

definition: Cognac/brandy 白蘭地|白兰地[bai2 lan2 di4] from the Cognac region of southwest France
